CustomField.formula: IF( BEGINS(Locale, "en"), "English", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "fr"), "French", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "es"), "Spanish", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "pt"), "Portuguese", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "it"), "Italian", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "de"), "German", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "zh"), "Chinese", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "nl"), "Dutch", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "ja"), "Japanese", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "ko"), "Korean", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "vi"), "Vietnamese", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "ru"), "Russian", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "sv"), "Swedish", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "da"), "Danish", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "fi"), "Finnish", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "nb"), "Norwegian", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "tr"), "Turkish", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "el"), "Greek", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "id"), "Indonesian", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "ms"), "Malay", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "th"), "Thai", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "hi"), "Hindi", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "hu"), "Hungarian", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "pl"), "Polish", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "cs"), "Czech", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "sk"), "Slovak", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "uk"), "Ukrainian", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "ca"), "Catalan", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "ro"), "Romanian", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "hr"), "Croatian", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "he"), "Hebrew", IF( BEGINS(Locale, "ar"), "Arabic","") )))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
